channel.title: spring-framework on Spring Cloud
channel.description: Recent content in spring-framework on Spring Cloud

item.title: Spring 6 And Spring Boot 3
item.description: The annual SpringOne conference was held online last September 1-2 due to an epidemic, and Pivotal (the owner of the Spring Project) hosts this conference once a year to meet with thousands of developers, customers and partners from around the world to share technical practices and discuss technology trends. Each conference also reveals the next big step in the Spring Project’s evolution. The highlight of this year’s conference is definitely Spring Framework 6.
